item.description:
This is Monday night Jazz. Quite a few members have raved about Jazz on Monday night's in the city. So This is for you!! If you like the idea just RSVP: "YES" Thanks.... :)

Here are some of the venues we'll be venturing out to for some great Jazz:

Wally's Cafe (the city's most famous jazz bar)
www.wallyscafe.com

427 Massachusetts Ave
Boston, MA 02118
(617) 424-1408

**************

The Beehive (Eatery & Jazz Bar)
www.beehiveboston.com

541 Tremont Street
boston, MA 02116
(617) 423-0069

**************

The Jazz Lounge at the Top of The Hub (the best view in all of the city)
www.topofthehub.net/jazz.php

800 Boylston St (Prudential Center)
Boston, MA 02199
Phone: (617) 536-1775

Please let me know if this is something that interests. If it does RSVP: "Yes"

Cheers... Everyone!

Michael

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Monday Night Jazz at Wally's Cafe, The Beehive, The Jazz Lounge Top of The Hub
